|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 10:7B:44, 38:D5:47, AC:9E:17 |oui = 10:7B:44, 38:D5:47, AC:9E:17

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/02/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07628HLTM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [[ASUS RT-ACRH17]]
*Web GUI: http://router.asus.com
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-127245-1-1.html Reviewed on '''KoolShare''' forums] (CN) (internal images) :Confirms 1.7Gbps 4x4 5GHz link rate
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ac42u |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = aka [[ASUS RT-ACRH17|RT-ACRH17]] }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:RT-AC42U left.png| File:RT-AC42U front2.png| File:RT-AC42U right.png| File:RT-AC42U back.png| File:RT-AC42U top.png| File:RT-AC42U front.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Notes== ===FCC info=== "ASUS RT-AC42U REV 1.10" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3492989 FCC photos].
A sticker on the flash chip suggests the ''Arcadyan WG911DAAC24-ASU'' model. {{see also|Arcadyan|ASUS}}
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00 MSQ-RTHD00] (2017-08-02) :Equipment: ''Wireless-AC1700 Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :Brand Name: ASUS; Model No.: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Letter/Model-Names-Confirmation-Letter-3492992 FCC Report] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH17]] (US) • [[ASUS RT-AC42U|ASUS RT-AC42U]] (EU) *[[ASUS RT-AC1700]] • (RT-ACRHD00) :Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Label/Label-Sample-3492991 FCC Label Sample]. <!-- {{FCC ST|08/02/2017|indexme.}} --> *CMIIT ID: [https://fccid.io/CMIIT-ID-2017AJ4019 CMIIT-ID-2017AJ4019] (2017-06-27)
Despite having hardware capable of implementing three radios, this device :appears to only use the 2.4GHz radio of the IPQ4019 configured as 2x2. [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/Users-Manual/User-Manual-3492997 User Manual] says, "wireless-AC speeds up to 1400Mbps on the 5GHz band :& 300Mbps on the 2.4GHz band concurrently". This is likely inaccurate. [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTHD00/RF-Exposure-Info/RF-Exposure-3492993 RF Exposure] document shows that : *two antennas are used for the 2.4 GHz radio (ANT 0+1) and *four antennas are used for the 5 GHz radio (ANT 0+1+2+3).
===PSU=== Power Adapter: 100-240VAC ~50/60 Hz 12VDC/2A * Power Adapter: '''SGE''' S24B72-120A200-C4 * S24B11-120A200-Y4 * Power Adapter: '''SFE''' F24W5-120120SPAU * Power Adapter: '''APD''' WA-24Q12FU
==See also== *[[ASUS RT-ACRH13]] (US) - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-ACRH13/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-ACRH17]] (US) - ''AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • *'''ASUS RT-AC42U''' (EU) - ''AC1700 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]] (EU) - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC58U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AC82U]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' • ([https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/model.c QCA])
